sim: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
type: LTPS IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors

sound_c: - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic

features_c:
- Fast battery charging 9V/2A

  - MP3/eAAC+/WMA/WAV/Flac player
  - Document viewer
  - Photo/video editor
colors: Klein Blue, Sakura Pink, Midnight Black
sensors: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro (except LX2), proximity, compass
internal: 32/64 GB, 4 GB RAM or 128 GB (China only)
primary_: Dual: 16 MP (f/2.2, 1.0Âµm) + 2 MP, phase detection autofocus, LED flash
